concept.title: DITA Open Toolkit
concept.shortdesc: The DITA Open Toolkit is an implementation of the OASIS DITA Technical Committee's specification for DITA DTDs and Schemas. The Toolkit transforms DITA content (maps and topics) into deliverable formats, such as XHTML, PDF, Eclipse Help, HTML Help, and JavaHelp.

conbody.p: This set of documentation contains some basic setup and overview information for the DITA Open Toolkit. The latest information about the toolkit, including plans for upcoming or future releases, can be found at dita.xml.org: The DITA Open Toolkit.
